title: 'You think he's joking about 2028?' Newsom asks about a 3rd Trump term
shortDescription: President Trump cannot have a third term as president, according to the Constitution. But Gavin Newsom thinks he will try anyway due to "2028 hats."

title: Trump, Newsom clash on crime crackdowns in major cities
shortDescription: President Donald Trump and California Gov. Gavin Newsom continue to clash on their approach to reducing crime in some of the country's largest cities.

title: Should taxpayer money protect private schools from shootings?
shortDescription: Years before the shooting at Annunciation Catholic Church, Minnesota's Catholic schools asked for additional security funding.

title: Are Iowa Democrats' special election victories an omen for 2026?
shortDescription: Democrat Catelin Drey won a special election for the Iowa Senate, breaking Republicans' supermajority. Can it tell us anything about 2026?

title: Trump cancels Kamala Harris' Secret Service protection
shortDescription: Trump canceled the Secret Service protection for former Vice President Kamala Harris, which former President Joe Biden extended beyond six months.

title: More protests against Trump are planned nationwide
shortDescription: 'Workers over billionaires' protests take aim at billionaires that helped implement Trump policies

title: Firefighter arrests renew debate about Trump immigration priorities
shortDescription: Federal officials confirmed they targeted the workers as part of a criminal investigation into two companies.

title: Trump administration planning major ICE operations in Chicago: reports
shortDescription: The Trump administration is reportedly planning for a major immigration enforcement operation in Chicago that could come next week, reports say.

title: FEMA workers benched over letter criticizing Trump cuts
shortDescription: Twenty FEMA employees are put on administrative leave after signing a letter criticizing the Trump administration's disaster preparedness plans.

title: Trump calls Walz, offers prayers on the Minneapolis school shooting
shortDescription: President Donald Trump addressed the school shooting in Minneapolis, Minnesota, on Aug. 27. He called for prayers, phoned Tim Walz and lowered flags.

title: Gavin Newsom says Donald Trump wants an illegal third term in office
shortDescription: The California governor delivered a stark warning about state of US democracy, saying Trump will use federal troops to rig elections, stay in office.

title: 'Billionaires back off': Sharpton leads march against Trump policies
shortDescription: Sharpton accused Wall Street of benefiting from government tax cuts at the expense of Medicaid, food assistance and other federal aid programs.

title: Vance is Trump's top messenger. This could be his hardest sell yet.
